Race.SpecificTitle: Alderman -- District B, Town of Delhi
Alderman -- District D, Town of Delhi
Town of Delhi -- 1% S&U Tax Renewal - M&BOA - 35 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Delhi Proposition
(1% Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Delhi, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") for an additional thirty-five (35) years, commencing January 1, 2030, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Town, all as defined by law (an estimated $620,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs of collecting and administering the Tax), to be used for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating streets, drainage and other capital facilities of the Town, title to which shall be in the public, the Tax to be a renewal of the Tax presently authorized to be levied through December 31, 2029?
